short_summary: Breakwater construction and supply of rock at North Rustico and Red Head harbors, Prince Edward Island. Supply of all plant, labour, equipment and materials for the work.
description: onsite preparations for rock stockpiling, supply of specified rock types, and completion of all works within 10 weeks.
duration_in_months: Illegal value, Questionable tender closing date for bidding:
full_summary:
### Breakwater Construction - Rock Supply

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Details**
=====================================

* **Reference Number**: WS4398958298
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4398958298
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Publication Date**: January 17, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 1, 2024 2:00 PM EST

**Project Information**
-----------------------

### Notice Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking proposals for the supply of all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials for the work at North Rustico Breakwater and Red Head Harbour. This includes site work preparation for rock stock piling, as well as the supply and stock piling of Core stone, Filter stone, and Armour Rock. The work must be completed within 10 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

### UNSPSC Codes
* 30121709 - Ungraded crushed rock
* 72141106 - Gravel or dirt road construction service
* 72141200 - Marine construction services

### Terms and Conditions
The work is a Request for Proposal and will be awarded to the lowest bidder.

### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

### Regions of Opportunity
* Prince Edward Island

### Regions of Delivery
* Prince Edward Island

### Contact Information
If you wish to obtain further information, please contact:
Edward Johnston
Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

Email: [edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### More Information
You can access the full notice on the Ariba website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18544767](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18544767) Note that you may be required to register on the website to view the notice.  You may also be required to provide your own account information upon registration which could result in your email account receiving a large number of emails and registering on the website could result in you losing access to your email account for a period of several days.
